name: Farming Simulator: Village 3D
description:
Are you tired of the banality of the same type simulators and lack of a fascinating plot? Don't worry, because now you have the opportunity to make your leisure time brighter and more interesting! The new application will show you virtual reality from a completely different side. Download and try this unusual simulator in action!
Here you can try yourself as a farmer! Start leading a rural life. Visit different cities and farms, develop your own farm. Take care of the livestock, transport horses, chickens, and cows to other locations! You'll also need to transport various goods, crates, hay, and even crops.
Premium Features:
Access to unique virtual farm
Unlocked all types of transport
Different Difficulty Levels.
Suitable for Both Kids and Adults
For harvesting and working in the field, you have access to different types of machines, for example, a tractor or a harvester! Check if you can handle the management of agricultural machinery.
Please note: there is no free content inside! You need to subscribe to use it.
Payment will be charged to your iTunes account immediately upon confirmation of the purchase of the subscription. 
Subscription will auto-renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period and payment is charged to your iTunes account. 
The renewal cost depends on your subscription plan. Our standard subscription plans:
1-week subscription is $5.99
For other currencies, the price matches the price level in the App Store Price Matrix. 
Subscription with a free trial period automatically renews to a paid subscription. You can cancel or manage the automatic renewal of the free trial by going to your Account Settings after purchase. Cancellation will take effect 24 hours after the last day of the current subscription period, and you will be transferred to a free service. 
Any unused portion of the 3-day free trial period (if offered) will be forfeited when purchasing a premium subscription during the free trial period. 
For any other information, see our privacy policy and terms of use.

Privacy Policy:https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ycdy15ltZuTXuIUfzT2yhmtrbUx65T0ThH_m9eW39Vg/edit?usp=sharing
Terms of Use:https://docs.google.com/document/d/1HUL6IziWyjndtj0ySL615VSY5bIRyGf60K1m4PrHwtI/edit?usp=sharing
